WorkItem.Description: I am running Wabbit on my Windows 8 tablet. The calculator works well but I can't get the window to open where I can access the File View Calculator Debug and Help menus. I need to rerun the setup. Can anyone help me with this issue?
WorkItem.Summary: Need to Open the Wabbitemu Window

Comments.Message: I know that on a desktop you can right click on the LCD screen, maybe there is something similar for the tablet.
